SIGNUP_MAIL.subject: Sign up mail.
SIGNUP_MAIL.body:
Congratulations on taking the first step towards unlocking valuable insights. Please find your verification code below:
<%= token %>

This code is associated with the action. If you did not request this code, please ignore this email or contact our support immediately to secure your account.

FORGOT_PASSWORD.subject: Forgot Password
FORGOT_PASSWORD.body:
You are receiving this email because we received a notification that you forgot your password.

Please click on the button below to reset your password:

Reset Password

If you did not request a password reset, no further action is required.

CHANGE_PASSWORD.subject: Change Password
CHANGE_PASSWORD.body: You are receiving this email because you've successfully changed your password.

EMAIL_VERIFICATION.subject: EMAIL_VERIFICATION
EMAIL_VERIFICATION.body:
Please you initiated a request to verify your email address.

Please use the <%= token %> to verify your email address.

If you did not initiate this request, please ignore this email. and change your password immediately or contact our support immediately to secure your account.
